title: Son of Frankenstein (restored, colorized) (1939, horror, imdb score: 7.1)

sources.title: Son of Frankenstein (restored, colorized) (1939, horror, imdb score: 7.1)
sources.description: Son of Frankenstein is a 1939 American horror film that was directed by Rowland V. Lee. The film is the third in Universal Pictures' Frankenstein series and is the follow-up to Bride of Frankenstein. Son of Frankenstein stars Basil Rathbone as Baron Wolf von Frankenstein who, with his wife Elsa (Josephine Hutchinson) and son Peter (Donnie Dunagan), return to his late father's estate. Near the castle lives Ygor (Bela Lugosi), a crazed shepherd whose neck was broken in an unsuccessful hanging attempt. Among the castle's remains, Frankenstein discovers the remains of the monster (Boris Karloff) and decides to try and save his family name by resurrecting the creature to prove his father was correct. He finds, however, the monster only responds to Ygor's commands.
